org.ehcache.clustered.client.config.builders

Class TimeoutsBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ehcache.clustered.client.config.builders.TimeoutsBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.ehcache.config.Builder<Timeouts>

    public final class TimeoutsBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.ehcache.config.Builder<Timeouts>
    Constructs instances of Timeouts. Initially, all timeouts are set to their default.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Timeouts build()
      Gets a new Timeouts instance using the current timeout duration settings.
      TimeoutsBuilder connection(java.time.Duration connectionTimeout)
      Sets the timeout for connecting to the server.
      TimeoutsBuilder read(java.time.Duration readOperationTimeout)
      Sets the timeout for read operations.
      static TimeoutsBuilder timeouts()
      Obtain a new get for timeouts
      TimeoutsBuilder write(java.time.Duration writeOperationTimeout)
      Sets the timeout for write operations like put and remove.

      • read

        public TimeoutsBuilder read(java.time.Duration readOperationTimeout)
        Sets the timeout for read operations. The default value for this timeout is Timeouts.DEFAULT_OPERATION_TIMEOUT.
        Parameters:
        readOperationTimeout - the Duration to use for the read operation timeout
        Returns:
        this Builder

      • write

        public TimeoutsBuilder write(java.time.Duration writeOperationTimeout)
        Sets the timeout for write operations like put and remove. The default value for this timeout is Timeouts.DEFAULT_OPERATION_TIMEOUT.
        Parameters:
        writeOperationTimeout - the Duration to use for a write operation timeout
        Returns:
        this Builder

      • connection

        public TimeoutsBuilder connection(java.time.Duration connectionTimeout)
        Sets the timeout for connecting to the server. The default value for this timeout is Timeouts.INFINITE_TIMEOUT.
        Parameters:
        connectionTimeout - the Duration to use for a connection timeout
        Returns:
        this Builder
